document_data.mainbody:
ulgar was a caravan guard in the midâ€“14 century DR.
He was a guard for Orthil Voldovans caravan and often worked on tasks together with Sarlor and Tarth.
Mulgar was a guard for Orthil Voldovans caravan in the , when it was joined by Shandril Shessair and Narm Tamaraith. During the ride from Scornubel to Triel, he was briefly assigned to quiet a horse somehow or else kill it, with Tarths help. He was also assigned briefly to keep watch on Shandril, where he had a quick outburst after she threatened to kill them for keeping her away from Narm after a bandit raid injured him. He helped cool the situation afterwards.
